checklist.name: Plot Plan/Survey
checklist.description: Certified survey showing lot boundaries, existing structures, and proposed building location
checklist.notes: Must be prepared by DC-licensed surveyor

checklist.name: Architectural Plans (Floor Plans, Elevations)
checklist.description: Complete architectural drawings showing all floor plans and building elevations
checklist.notes: Must be stamped by DC-registered architect

checklist.name: Structural Drawings
checklist.description: Structural plans, foundation details, and engineering calculations
checklist.notes: Must be stamped by DC-licensed Professional Engineer

checklist.name: Zoning Compliance Statement
checklist.description: Detailed zoning analysis demonstrating compliance with DC Zoning Regulations
checklist.notes: Include calculations for FAR, height, lot occupancy, and parking

checklist.name: Green Building Checklist
checklist.description: DC Green Building Act compliance documentation
checklist.notes: Projects over 10,000 sq ft must meet LEED or equivalent

checklist.name: Energy Code Compliance (REScheck/COMcheck)
checklist.description: Energy code compliance calculations and forms
checklist.notes: Use DOE REScheck for residential, COMcheck for commercial

checklist.name: Electrical Plans
checklist.description: Electrical system plans showing service, panels, circuits, and devices
checklist.notes: Include panel schedules, load calculations, and service details

checklist.name: Plumbing Plans
checklist.description: Plumbing system layout including water supply, drainage, and fixtures
checklist.notes: Show all fixtures, pipe sizes, and connections to utilities

checklist.name: Mechanical Plans
checklist.description: HVAC system plans and equipment specifications
checklist.notes: Include equipment schedules and load calculations

checklist.name: Fire Alarm and Suppression Plans
checklist.description: Fire protection system plans including alarms and sprinklers
checklist.notes: Required for most commercial and multi-family buildings

checklist.name: Stormwater Management Plan
checklist.notes: Must comply with DC Department of Energy and Environment requirements

checklist.name: Traffic Impact Study
checklist.description: Transportation impact analysis for projects affecting traffic patterns

conditionalRequirement.condition: Required for projects generating significant traffic (typically 100+ trips in peak hour)

checklist.notes: Coordinate with DC Department of Transportation (DDOT)

checklist.name: Historic Preservation Review (HPRB)

conditionalRequirement.condition: Required for properties in historic districts or designated landmarks

checklist.notes: Check if property is in a historic district before applying

checklist.name: Public Space Application
checklist.description: DDOT public space permit for work in public right-of-way

conditionalRequirement.condition: Required if construction affects sidewalks, streets, or other public space

checklist.notes: Separate permit required from DDOT Public Space Division

fees.calculationMethod: Based on construction type and estimated cost
